subtasks.description: Create monitoring API endpoints for health, metrics, and alerts
Build production dashboard with real-time metrics
Integrate with data normalization for analytics insights
Create comprehensive test suite for monitoring

completion_criteria: Production monitoring system tracks system health, performance, and errors
Real-time metrics dashboard displays key performance indicators
Alert system notifies of critical issues
Integration with data normalization provides analytics insights
All monitoring endpoints functional and tested

real_world_testing.notes: Production monitoring system successfully implemented and integrated
real_world_testing.validation_notes: Monitoring system ready for Testing Agent validation with comprehensive metrics, alerts, and dashboard
testing_phases: Phase 4: Integration with main application - COMPLETED

agent_handoff.handoff_notes: b.19 Production Monitoring & Analytics module IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE. Comprehensive monitoring system implemented with real-time metrics, alerts, and dashboard. Ready for Testing Agent validation.
